backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Blobby AI backend, implementing user profile management and chat session/message storage with role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs and titles to their corresponding source files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the Blobby AI UI redesign.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, utilities, and services.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, border, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Blobby AI app, loading the Inter font from Google Fonts, including the Puter.js CDN script, and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages the onboarding, authentication, and profile-loading flow, rendering the appropriate screen (OnboardingScreen, LoginScreen, loading spinner, or main Layout with optional ProfileSetupModal).
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Chat message component that renders user and assistant messages with markdown parsing, syntax-highlighted code blocks with copy buttons, task-type badges, image display, and an optional HTML preview button.
frontend/src/components/ChatWindow.tsx: Main chat interface component that manages local message state, session creation, AI message streaming, and dispatches HTML/image previews to the parent layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Top-level layout component that composes the TopBar, SidebarDrawer, ChatWindow, and PreviewModal, managing session selection and preview state.
frontend/src/components/LoadingIndicator: Simple animated three-dot typing indicator component used to signal AI response generation.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Authentication screen displaying the Blobby AI branding and an Internet Identity sign-in button with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text entry, image attachment via file picker or drag-and-drop, and send-on-Enter behavior with auto-resizing textarea.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingScreen: Welcome/onboarding screen shown to new users featuring the mascot, tagline, a start button, and suggested prompt cards.
frontend/src/components/PreviewModal.tsx: Full-screen modal that renders generated HTML content in a sandboxed iframe or displays a generated image, with refresh and download actions.
frontend/src/components/PreviewPanel.tsx: A panel component that renders HTML content in a sandboxed iframe (via blob URL) or displays a generated image, with controls for refresh, download, fullscreen, and close.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, saving the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation before calling `onComplete`.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: A collapsible desktop sidebar that lists chat sessions sorted by recency, supports creating new chats, deleting sessions, and toggling collapsed state.
frontend/src/components/SidebarDrawer.ts: A mobile slide-in drawer version of the sidebar with session list, new chat, session deletion, and logout functionality, rendered over a backdrop overlay.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: A simple mobile top navigation bar with a hamburger menu button, centered app title, and a settings icon button.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeScreen.ts: A welcome/empty-state screen displaying the Blobby mascot and a 2Ã—2 grid of prompt suggestion cards that populate the chat input when clicked.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles and chat sessions, wrapping backend actor calls with caching and invalidation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet using Tailwind CSS with a dark violet-themed design system, defining CSS custom properties, utility classes, and animations for the Blobby AI UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/services/aiService.ts: Service module that wraps the Puter AI API to send chat messages (with optional streaming) and generate images, injecting a system prompt that defines the Blobby AI persona.
frontend/src/utils/codeRenderer.ts: Utility functions for rendering and downloading HTML content via Blob URLs, and for extracting HTML code blocks from markdown text.
frontend/src/utils/imageHandler.ts: Utility functions for converting image files to base64, creating/revoking object URLs for thumbnails, and validating image file type and size.
frontend/src/utils/taskClassifier.ts: Classifies user input into task types (Chat, Code, ImageGen, etc.) using regex patterns, and maps each task type to a specific AI model and badge color.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color tokens (using oklch), typography, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for Blobby AI describing the app's architecture, tech stack, UI layout, model routing strategy, known issues, and list of implemented features at version 5.
